title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2063/93 of 27 July 1993 amending for the second time Commission Regulation (EEC) No 585/93 on the implementation of promotional and publicity measures in respect of milk and milk products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2063/93 of 27 July 1993 amending for the second time Commission Regulation (EEC) No 585/93 on the implementation of promotional and publicity measures in respect of milk and milk products
THE COMMISSION OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The date 15 April 1993 referred to in Article 3 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 585/93 is hereby replaced by 15 August 1993.
2. The date 10 May 1993 referred to in the first subparagraph of Article 5 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 585/93 is hereby replaced by 22 August 1993.
3. The date 30 September 1993 referred to in Article 7 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 585/93 is hereby replaced by 10 October 1993.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 215, 30. 7. 1992, p. 67.
(2) OJ No L 131, 26. 5. 1977, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 147, 29. 5. 1992, p. 3.
(4) OJ No L 108, 1. 5. 1993, p. 4.
(5) OJ No L 61, 13. 3. 1993, p. 26.
(6) OJ No L 124, 20. 5. 1993, p. 30.
